metadata.synopsis: Saer Frenello, character outside Elfsong Tavern, drinking and wandering and talking to other characters.

0.speaker: Saer Frenello
0.text: Tyr's balls... Just lost the best job I ever had, easy work in the Upper City - but you don't care, and why should you? Sorry I said anything.

1.speaker: Saer Frenello
1.text: You haven't heard of any open positions for an event planner, have you? No, of course not - just look at you. Why do I even bother?
